name: Shot of Rhythm
description:
Shot of rhythm is an immersive rhythm game that combines the shooter and music visualization in virtual reality. Cruise through your music library in a retro futuristic setting as you blast enemies. Simplistic controls that are easy to learn and intuitive gameplay. Dodge bullets and aim for the best score.



Each level is generated based on the music you chose from your music library. Try out your favorite songs and battle your music library as you blast away enemies to the beat of the music.

Features
  • Enjoy your songs and battle through the beat.
  • Instant level generation uniquely based on your own music library.
  • Weapon customizations, chose the style that suits you.
  • Exercise as you dodge bullets and shoot enemies.
